report.title: Record counts by taxon
report.description: Lists taxa and the number of records of each.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.taxon_meaning_id=cttl.taxon_meaning_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# and cttl.id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id AND (o.zero_abundance='f') AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true AND o.record_status<>'R' AND cttl.preferred=true

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the report.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected
